img_above_text:
![Foothills Walkthrough \(61\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/65/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2861%29.png)
When it seems like the fight is over, it's just getting started and entering its second phase. Blood will spill from the deer and pool all around it. The blood will poison you, so you'll want Antimiasma Powder to help you deal with any damage that comes from it.
img_below_text:
In this phase, you'll need to avoid the pools of blood. There are also some projectiles, where little orbs of blood will float up in the air and then hone in on you. Thankfully, you'll have a little bit of help with this one, as Zhu Bajie will appear in the second phase to give you a hand.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(63\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3d/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2863%29.png)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Foothills Walkthrough \(61\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/6/65/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2861%29.png)
When it seems like the fight is over, it's just getting started and entering its second phase. Blood will spill from the deer and pool all around it. The blood will poison you, so you'll want Antimiasma Powder to help you deal with any damage that comes from it."
        - Following Text: "In this phase, you'll need to avoid the pools of blood. There are also some projectiles, where little orbs of blood will float up in the air and then hone in on you. Thankfully, you'll have a little bit of help with this one, as Zhu Bajie will appear in the second phase to give you a hand.
![Foothills Walkthrough \(63\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/3d/Foothills_Walkthrough_%2863%29.png)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts the second phase of a boss fight in *Black Myth: Wukong*. A corrupted deer-like creature is surrounded by pools of blood, which poison the player. Floating blood orbs are visible, likely representing projectiles that target the player. The setting is a rocky, snowy area, emphasizing the dark and ominous atmosphere of the encounter. This phase requires strategic avoidance of the blood pools and projectiles, with Zhu Bajie providing assistance later.
